page.title: 02HOUSING.
page.content: In our area there is quite a lot of older{housing.}Most of our class{(76%) live in terraced houses. These were built in the{19th. Century.}Most of these houses have been done up with new bathrooms and central heating. There are also some large detached and semi-detached villas near our school. These were built in about{1740.} Merchants used to live here. {"OUR STREET" by Lee Hunter(11yrs.) Our street has got houses It has got flats And the houses have rats We climb up the trees And get stung by bumble bees Our Street is a funny street. The shops the pubs and all the school And we even include some swimming pools, The scrap yard and railways too Our Street is just right for you.
